name: tsd-check-runtime
description: TypeScript types declaration checking library. It's like tsd-check but verifies at runtime, actually compiling the code

scripts.prettier: npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma all --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120 --no-bracket-spacing  --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*"
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build && npm run test && npm tun docs
scripts.docs: npx typedoc src/toHave/types.ts src/toEdit/types.ts src/toTrigger/types.ts --theme markdown --out api
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npx shx rm -rf dist/**/__tests__

author: Sebasti√°n Gurin
